title: Strange version appears when downloading TB to new laptop
content:
I've just downloaded TB to my new laptop and it has loaded version 128.6.0esr (64-bit) with About showing 3 extra notes:- Nebular icon, Thunderbird is up to date and 'You are currently on an esr update channel'. The layout looks way too much like Outlook for my liking so I checked my out laptop and About shows it to be 115.18.0 (32-bit) with Supernova icon, Thunderbird is up to date and the same 'You are currently on an esr update channel'. So, how do I get TB on the new laptop (currently showing 128.6.0esr (64 bit) to be, or at least have the same layout as, my old one showing 115.18.0 (32 bit) that I know and love? Thanks Chris

p.s. I can take screenshots of both layouts if necessary but if I can get to the same version first that might solve the issue.
creator: chris119

title: How to undo threading of emails
content:
I am using Thunderbird on a Windows 10 PC with RCN internet. I had to create a new "account" when an old one wouldn't work since a recent Thunderbird ungrade ( :/ ) and now this new one keeps threading emails, which I hate and want back to individual ones.

Is this possible?

Thank you.
creator: murphy.lauri.a

title: Hacked Email
content: My Email has been hacked - I have contacted Telstra reset my password I am now able to receive emails but cannot send them Can you help?

title: Mozilla  donated
content: After installation, continually asked for my name, e-mail address, Also continually asked for a donation which I have done through PayPal. In any case, the program never gets any further and, the (word, ALLOW) never can be found. Any help will be appreciated.
creator: jimking46

title: Thunderbird email reply displays are unreadable body text
content:
Some emails I receive, when I reply to them, don't correctly display the email (body text) correctly. It looks like Thunderbird is choosing the wrong font colour for the reply email text and I'm after any info on why this happens and how to fix it.

Attached are two screen shots. "original.jpg" shows the original email and "reply.jpg" is my reply email. It doesn't always happen and it *may* be emails sent out by Zendesk.

I'm on latest TBird 128.6.0esr but it's been happening for the last few releases.
creator: webby2019

title: SMIME encryption of subject line
content: I have installed 2 valid SMIME certificates. When I send to the first recipient, the subject line is encrypted. when I send to the second recipient, there is a lock symbol with a red diagonal line across it, i presume denoting that the subject line is not encrypted. What is the difference is there a user setting for it be changed?
creator: stephensonrod

title: problema certificato pop3
content:
Buongiorno,

da un paio di giorni i messaggi relativi al mio indirizzo email duar@duar.it non vengono scaricati. Mi esce la seguente scritta: "IL CERTIFICATO DI POP3.DUAR.IT NON E' VALIDO PER QUEL SERVER. E' POSSIBILE CHE QUALCUNO STIA TENTANTO DI SOSTITUIRSI AL SERVER ED E' SCONSIGLIATO CONTINUARE."

Ho notato che le email riesco ad inviarle e se vado sulla interfaccia webmail vedo le email ricevute.

Resto in attesa di un vs riscontro per risolvere il problema

Grazie Deborah
creator: duar8

title: emails returned, says a different email address than it was sent to
content: Since a week ago, I can receive emails from a friend's email address just fine, but not reply to those emails or even sent new emails. They all come back as undeliverable, BUT say they're undeliverable to the secondary email I have for her, even though I never sent the email to the secondary address. Even after deleting the secondary address AND deleting and re-entering the main email address for her, no luck. I can send emails from my webmail.shaw account to her without problems. I would love to have this issue fixed ASAP, as I need to email her almost daily. Thank you very much, Jane.
creator: rg8dwdcg9c

title: default identity page
content: how can i add a signature text AND the signature (logo) from a file at the same time? It seems it is an either or?
creator: littleyam

title: Unable to write to disk
content:
I am getting the infamous "Unable to write to disk" message on all of my pop accounts.

I have plenty of disk space and the hard drive does not have errors. I changed all of the attribute bytes to write (not ready only) I created a new account with no imports. It also gets this error. I have one IMAP account that allows me to at least read my email, but I can't organize it. If I copy my pop account folders to that IMAP account they upload. Uh, no thanks. If I copy my pop account folders to the local folders area, same error (Unable to write to disk) I uninstalled and re-installed, and the profiles were all still there. I would even settle for incoming on an IMAP and moving incoming email to my pop folder, but you can't do that either.

I fear that the profiles are somehow corrupted. I have ALL of my email backed up and restore-able. There are some messages on the server that need to stay there for now.

Please help. I've spent 10+ hours on this and none of the existing help seems to apply here. I'm on the brink of giving up and switching to another tool.
creator: Tom490

title: non ricevo la posta in arrivo
content: Buongiorno, non ricevo la posta in arrivo
creator: valledellacate1

title: reinstallation emailadress
content:
hallo, two weeks ago my "Arcor-account" on Thunderbird indicated "timeout" and I couldn't send or recieve messages. Then I deleted the account on Thunderbird and tried to reinstall. But that doesn't work. Thunderbird found the settings of the adress, but when confirming it, they said the settings or password are wrong, what is definitely not the case. The Arcoradress is very old, Arcor belongs meanwhile to Vodafone. May be that causes the problem. I failed also on trying to install manually.

Thank you for helping me best regards Uwe
creator: info12402

title: Non riesco a ricevere le mail
content:
Buongiorno, non riesco più a ricevere da ieri la mail su Thunderbild e non capisco cosa fare. 

E' possibile avere supporto?
creator: claudiopace64

title: Messaggi sul server pop cancellati prima del tempo impostato
content:
Buongiorno! Ho impostato l'accesso in due modalità differenti al mio account GMAIL: - il primo in modalità IMAP per poter avere accesso alle mail in tempo reale dal PC, dal tablet e dallo smartphone (entrambi android) - il secondo in modalità POP3 per scaricare i messaggi più vecchi di 4 anni e salvarli in Thunderbird.

Il problema che ho riscontrato è che nonostante io specifichi di lasciare i messaggi sul server per 1460 gg, mi scarica dal server pop i messaggi di 559 gg fa.

Come posso correggere? a me serve che i messaggi siano visibili online più tempo in caso di ricerca.

E' un errore o sbaglio io qualcosa?

Grazie in anticipo per il supporto
creator: francesco27

title: Forwards
content:
When I forward a message to someone, I have the problem, that since ca. 2024 (a new version), at the beginning of my message are included (reproduced) all the informations from the original sender. It includes half a page or more of dates, which nobody needs. How can I reduce it?

title: I am getting an annoying popup stating that Dan.Hromada@citizensforfreespeech.org is asking for my Google password....this email account is not associated at all with Google or Gmail.
content:
I am getting an annoying popup stating that Dan.Hromada@citizensforfreespeech.org is asking for my Google password....this email account is not associated at all with Google or Gmail. It's hosted on the organization's server. Please see the screenshot of the pop-up.

Thank you, Dan Hromada
creator: Dan.Hromada

title: Secondary sort for emails changed
content:
Hi there. I've always used the two click method to sort primary and secondary columns (Not sure what the term would be) So I click on Date column header, first, until it is sorted with newest email at the top. This usually takes 2 clicks as it seems that the default sort for that column is oldest on top. Then I click on the Read status header, also 2 clicks as it seems that read on top is the default.

How it used to work is, after this, the newest unread emails is on top of the list. But today I noticed that now the oldest unread is on top when doing the same tests. This is after the latest update for Thunderbird for Linux Mint that I ran. (It might have chanced earlier but I've only noticed it today)

Thunderbird version: 115.16.0esr (64-bit) Linux Mint version: 21.3
creator: tungsten15

title: Non ricevo le mail
content: non ricevo più mail. Il mio provider è Aruba. Fino ad oggi non ho avuto problemi ma mi sono accorto ora che non ricevo più mail. In un pc non mi da messaggi di errore ma non mi fa ricevere mail, nel secondo pc invece, quando scarico la posta mi da il seguente messaggio: IL CERTIFICATO PER POP3.MAHESAS.IT NON E' VALIDO PER QUEL SERVER. E' POSSIBILE CHE QUALCUNO STIA TENTANDO DI SOSTITUIRSI AL SERVER ED E' SCONSIGLIATO CONTINUARE. Le mail invece vengono inviate regolarmente

title: Archived Emails cannot be located
content: Hi, I tend to archive my local folders once a year and until this year the archives have gone into a folder called archives but this year they seem to have disappeared. It says they went into a folder called All Mail but there is no such folder under local folders. What has happened to these emails. Thanks, Roger

title: How to display remote images after having rejected them
content: When receiving a message containing remote images, by default the images are not displayed for security reasons. When opening the email, there is an option to display or reject the remote images. After I have selected not to view the images (perhaps by mistake), how can I subsequently display them?
creator: sp20

title: Condivisione dell'account da parte di più utenti e salvataggio in cartelle locali
content: Buongiorno. Abbiamo una mail aziendale e scarichiamo dal server su 5 computer. Avremmo bisogno che su tutti i computer fossero presenti tutti i messaggi, invece abbiamo notato che non corrispondono mai, e questo crea gravi problemi nel lavoro. Abbiamo l'impressione che siano scaricati su 2 o 3 macchine al massimo, chi si connette dopo non trova più i messaggi in entrata che gli altri colleghi hanno già scaricato. Abbiamo controllato le impostazioni del provider (Aruba), e i messaggi vengono conservati sul server per 15 giorni, quindi non dovrebbe dipendere dall'account. Sapreste aiutarmi? grazie
creator: valentina.leonini

title: problema scaricamento messaggi su diversi pc
content:
Salve, siamo una azienda che usa thunderbird con aruba e proprio dominio, da ieri giorno 8 gennaio 2025 su alcune macchine non avviene più lo scaricamento dei messaggi senza aver variato alcuna impostazione, facendo una prova avviene invece l'invio della posta.Nella barra inferiore continua ad apparire stato: Collegato, ma non si fa riferimento a scaricamento messaggi dal server come prima etc. Gentilmente potete consigliarmi? Ho già provato a disinstallare e reinstallare salvando il profilo in Appdata ma non cambia nulla.

Grazie
creator: flixo

title: COLORE TESTO
content: Egr. sigg., è da un po' di tempo che non riesco a trovare la soluzione per dare un colore al testo/messaggio, strumento molto utile per fare correzioni/modifiche nello scambio di posta. Ho provato anche ad impostare il colore standard del testo ma non accetta la modifica. Solo ed esclusivamente colore nero.

creator: hneumeyer

title: Forward emails from my bank with bank statement are totaly blank since yesterday update.
content:
I have a problem forwarding emails from one of my banks containing bank statements to my accountant. I have setup message filters and all is working good for one bank, but emails from another bank won't forward at all. As soon as I run Thunderbird in the morning, I get the blank forward email from that bank containing only subject with my accountant email fulfilled, but no body and no attachments.

Then I have to close that window, and do it manually every morning. I click the received email from bank, than forward, put forward address from accountant and send.

Since yesterday's update of Thunderbird, I cannot even forward email from this bank (inline). The email is totally blank, no body, no attachment. If I select to forward as an attachment (*.eml) than it is all OK.

All other emails forward fine. The problem is only with this bank. Also I have noticed that the digital signature from this bank is not valid, so maybe this is what is creating the problem.
creator: razor.amd

title: mails reçus
content: pourquoi les mails ne veulent pas defiler
creator: almile.ea

title: Accept meeting invite and no response is created or sent even when requested
content:
I'm using thunderbird: 115.16.0esr on Kubuntu Linux 22.04 LTS and have the same problem as this Archived, yet unresolved problem:

"""When I get a meeting invite, and accept that invite, selecting "send a response now", no message ever arrives at the email of the inviter and no email ends up in any of my folders (drafts or sent). It is like nothing happens. The event *is* accepted and added to the calendar, but no respose is created or sent. """

  • I can send a normal Email to the sender of the invite.
  • The Email is configured in the calendar

The only differences to the other thread are :

  • My Email is hosted somewhere else.
  • I use Nextcloud Calender via WEBDAVS, instead of the local calendar
  • The invite I receive is created in outlook.

Any help is appreciated. Thanks!
creator: mvd26

title: acces à mes mails @gmail.com
content: je n'arrive pas à acceder à ma messagerie gmail à travers thunderbird

title: Do I have to put property values in json file when I create a theme? How to pass an array for a "border-inline-start"?
content:
First of all I want to apologize for my lack of knowledge. I know almost nothing about HTML and CSS, but I've decided to start using some desktop e-mail client and since Thunderbird looks quite boring and I was bored too, I've tried to customize it.

Now I've got a few questions. :)

In this guide https://developer.thunderbird.net/add-ons/web-extension-themes is stated that for each variable, not only for our custom variables (--my-variable-one etc.) we should declare such variable in the style.css, then assign a key to it and then declare a value for that key.

I've started preparing my theme this way, especially that I've mainly used special keys provided by TB developers in the Theme API, but I've discovered that declaring style directly in the css file also works.

So should we always put values in json file or can we jus load css via json?

I ask because I want to change the color of the left panel in the calendar view. To be honest, I still haven't checked if declaring three separate longhand properties would work, but I wanted to pass an array to get the

  1. calsidebar_splitter,
  2. listSplitter { 
   border-inline-start: 1px solid #0f66bd !important;

}

So initially I've wrote in css:

  1. calsidebar_splitter,
  2. listSplitter { 
   border-inline-start: var(--my-splitter-color);

}

and unfortunately writing something like that:

"splitter_color": "--my-splitter-color"

and

"splitter_color": "[1px, solid, rgb(15, 102, 189)]

doesn't work. :/
creator: Stiff_Cheesecake
